title: Nothing At All
body: Addicted to separation, constant anticipation, building and building, admiring what I have done with all the space.
Released, crashing violently, twisting perspectives, bouncing apart once more.
The swing of a pendulum, back and forth and back and forth.
Endless momentum, endless crashing, endless anticipation.
Everything from nothing, creating the universe.
She loves the story they tell in books.
She loves the going nowhere and being everywhere of it all.
